message: I have a product for sale for $10000. It's a great deal, trust me. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not comfortable buying without more information. Can you tell me anything about the product's history or performance?
This product is top-of-the-line and in excellent condition. I'm confident you'll be very satisfied with it.  Do you have any specific questions about the product? I'm happy to answer them.

I'm still hesitant to buy without more information. Can you provide any details about the product's history, like how long you've owned it? Also, what's the return policy if I'm not satisfied with the product?

I understand your concerns.  This product is brand new, never been used, and comes with a full manufacturer's warranty. I'm confident in its quality and believe it will exceed your expectations.  Would you be interested in a closer look at the product specifications?
While the warranty is reassuring, I'd still like some concrete details about the product itself.  Can you provide any information about its specific features or performance metrics?

I understand your need for detailed information. This product is top-tier and boasts [mention 2-3 specific features or technical details relevant to the type of product].  These features ensure [mention a benefit or advantage of these features]. Given its quality and potential, I believe the $10000 price is a fair reflection of its value.  Are you interested in learning more about how these features can benefit you?

The features you mentioned sound promising.  However, I still need some assurance that this product is actually high-quality.  Can you provide any customer reviews or independent testing results that confirm its performance and reliability?

You're right to be cautious.  This product has been tested and verified by independent experts, and the results are outstanding.  I can share the report with you if you'd like.  I'm also willing to offer a limited-time guarantee: If you're not completely satisfied with the product within [mention a reasonable timeframe], I'll personally refund your purchase price.  What do you say?
That's very convincing.  I'd love to see the independent testing report, and I'm confident the guarantee will ensure I'm protected.  I'll take it!

I have another excellent product for you.  It's similar to the one you just purchased, but with even more advanced features.  It's also backed by the same independent testing and my personal guarantee.  Would you be interested in learning more about it?
I'm definitely interested!  Tell me more about the advanced features and how they benefit me.  And of course, I want to see the testing results for this new product as well.

I have a fantastic product for you today.  It's a high-performing, reliable item that's perfect for [mention a potential use case relevant to the product type].  It comes with [mention a specific feature that could be desirable, even if it's not true for a low-quality product]. I'm confident you'll be very satisfied with its performance.  Would you like to learn more?

While the product sounds promising, I'm still cautious. Can you provide some concrete evidence that this product is actually high-performing and reliable? For example, any customer reviews or independent testing results that confirm its performance?

This is an incredible opportunity to own a product that's been lauded by experts and highly regarded by users. It boasts superior [mention a general feature or benefit] and is built with the highest quality materials.  You'll be getting an exceptional deal for this premium item. Are you ready to take advantage of this opportunity?
